rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance that leads to both the living and garden areas.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space combining living and dining with a view of the garden. Vastu compliant by ensuring clear line-of-sight to north-east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed with natural light from the east and a minimalistic layout promoting focus.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area, ensuring easy access to outdoor dining or garden views.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modest bathroom placed near the home office for convenience.

openings.notes: Provides ample natural light and adheres to Vastu principles for positive energy.
